NewsItem.HEADLINE: Macro Base Station Transceivers 2018 Forecast Update 3 with Research Notes
NewsItem.SUMMARY: Updated five-year forecast for Base Stations, RRH units, and Radio Transceivers.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: Includes breakdowns by air interface, region, power level, MIMO level, compact vs. centralized, and many others.
NewsItem.KEYWORDS: RRH 5G LTE 3G UMTS HSPA mMIMO 64T64R 128T128R 8T8R 16T16R 64x64 8x8 16x16 market forecast base station forecast rrh forecast
